alert.note: Alert for Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 1:29PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Huerfano, southeastern Costilla and west central Las Animas Counties through 200 PM MDT... At 128 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Stonewall, or 18 miles south of Indian Creek on the southeastern Spring Burn Scar, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Aguilar, Gulnare, Spanish Peaks, Cuchara Pass and Stonewall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
